str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From chairo; graciousness, of manner or act.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From epi and phaino; to shine upon, i.e. Become visible or known.
Saving, bringing salvation; subst: salvation. Neuter of the same as soteria as noun; defender or defence.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.
